Name: 25 Layers of Pain
About the game: 25 Layers of Pain is a rage platformer for those who wish to challenge their precision platforming skills. Or individuals who just plain hate themselves. Can you make it past the 25th Layer? Probably not. Jam out to the soundtrack as you cry in misery. Gamepad recommended unless you enjoy carpal tunnel.
